content: That sounds like a great way to make data entry easier and more accurate. I'll set up the drop-down menu for my Spring Fling Market sheet. By the way, I sold around 15 pieces of jewelry and 10 candles at the event, and I'm hoping to follow up with the local boutique owner who expressed interest in carrying my products in her store. Do you think I should create a separate sheet to track my interactions with potential wholesale customers like her?
